name: B. Drinks
statement:
Little Vasya loves orange juice very much. That’s why any food and drink
in his kitchen necessarily contains orange juice. There are drinks in
his fridge, the volume fraction of orange juice in the -th drink equals
percent.One day Vasya decided to make himself an orange cocktail. He
took equal proportions of each of the drinks and mixed them. Then he
wondered, how much orange juice the cocktail has.Find the volume
fraction of orange juice in the final drink.
